channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Cyber Monday kitchen deals are live, with up to 50% off Ninja, Breville, KitchenAid and more
item.description: Cyber Monday Kitchen deals are the perfect opportunity to restock and refresh your kitchen countertops, and with these hand-picked deals, you're in for a tasty treat.

item.title: Le Black Friday retire 43 % sur le prix de cet excellent TV TCL mini LED 65″ 144 Hz noté 9/10
item.description: Le TCL 65C89K est un téléviseur au rapport qualité/prix imbattable, d'autant qu'il est affiché à 849 euros au lieu de 1 499 euros sur Rakuten en ce moment.

item.title: Galaxy S26, Plus et Ultra : date de sortie, prix, caractéristiques, tout ce qu’il faut savoir
item.description: Chaque année, Samsung nous livre sa nouvelle fournée de Galaxy S, mais 2026 pourrait bien marquer une rupture. Voici ce qu'il faut attendre des Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26 Plus et Galaxy S26 Ultra.

item.title: The indie web is here to make the internet weird again
item.description: This is The Stepback, a weekly newsletter breaking down one essential story from the tech world. For more on internet culture, follow Stevie Bonifield. The Stepback arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 8AM ET. Opt in for The Stepback here. How it started The indie web began a few years after the end of GeoCities, […]

item.title: The 2025 Installer gift guide
item.description: Hi, friends! Welcome to Installer No. 107, your guide to the best and Verge-iest stuff in the world. (If you're new here, welcome, hope you're having a lovely and long weekend, and also you can read all the old editions at the Installer homepage.) This week, I've been reading about Faker and Chinese EVs and […]

item.title: Test de la Garmin Venu 4 : une montre design, discrète et élégante, mais une vraie montre de sport
item.description: Garmin propose, avec sa Venu 4, une montre de sport au design élégant et plutôt discret avec son boîtier en métal. Elle profite cependant de fonctions avancées pour le sport et même d'une vraie lampe torche.

item.title: Hurry! Save $590 on HP's gorgeous wood PC - RTX 4060, 2TB SSD and Core Ultra 7 265F turns it into a fantastic sub-$1000 powerhouse
item.description: This is probably the fastest PC with a RTX 4060 GPU you can get for around $1000

item.title: Upgrade your coffee maker this Cyber Monday – save up to 60% off De'Longhi, Ninja and Keurig
item.description: Whether you want an espresso machine or a drip coffee maker, there are Cyber Monday deals to tempt you.

item.title: Don't miss Dyson's Cyber Monday sale – it's your last chance to save big on vacuums, Airwraps and more
item.description: From cheap Dyson cordless vacuums to Airwraps and fans on offer, Dyson's Cyber Monday deals are a great last chance to spend less and get more

item.title: The absolute best Cyber Monday deals you can already shop
item.description: Black Friday might officially be over, but that doesn’t mean the deals have simply evaporated. As we turn our attention to Cyber Monday, many of our favorite deals are still holding strong. That means you have another chance to save if you’ve been too preoccupied with holiday leftovers. Be forewarned, though: stock on certain items […]

item.description: Specs for three Galaxy S26 handsets have leaked, though the upgrades seem to be minor ones.

item.title: The Best Gadgets of November 2025
item.description: Might as well rename November to Game-vember since there was so much great gaming hardware announced.

item.title: The Oceans Are Going to Rise—but When?
item.description: The uniquely vulnerable West Antarctic Ice Sheet holds enough water to raise global sea levels by 5 meters. But when that will happen—and how fast—is anything but settled.
